edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder.scorer
Interface Scoreable

All Superinterfaces:
Data, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Token
public interface Scoreable
extends Data

Represents an entity that can be scored against a data

Field Summary
static java.util.Comparator<Scoreable> COMPARATOR
          A Scoreable comparator that is used to order scoreables according to their score, in descending order.
 
Method Summary
 float calculateScore(Data data)
          Calculates a score against the given data.
 int getFrameNumber()
          Returns the frame number that this Scoreable should be scored against.

Field Detail

COMPARATOR

static final java.util.Comparator<Scoreable> COMPARATOR
A Scoreable comparator that is used to order scoreables according to their score, in descending order.

Note: since a higher score results in a lower natural order, statements such as Collections.min(list, Scoreable.COMPARATOR) actually return the Scoreable with the highest score, in contrast to the natural meaning of the word "min".

Method Detail

float calculateScore(Data data)
Calculates a score against the given data. The score can be retrieved with get score

Returns:
